tool_description: This api will help you keep your Russia 2018 scores updated, so you can chat and discuss with your friends
name: Russia 2018 Worldcup Tournament
title: Russia 2018 Worldcup Tournament

api_list.name: details
api_list.description: This endpoint replies all associated data to a game receiving the game_id as parameter.

api_list.name: list
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a array of match objects for the tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://perodriguezl-russia-2018-worldcup-tournament-v1.p.rapidapi.com/public/tournament/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perodriguezl-russia-2018-worldcup-tournament-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: current
api_list.description: This endpoint will show the game that follows or is/are being played in the tournament in this moment and the scores.
